response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $900,000. I understand its value to you might be $1,000,000, but I hope this offer presents a fair compromise. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making an offer that suits both of us.", "product_price": 900000}
